name: IGC_SPOTTER_COMORBIDS
description: Data for the inpatient rehab facility (IRF) preadmission, including data from the IGC Spotter section.

columns.name: HLV_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the value record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the registry data record.

columns.name: COMORBID_CONDITIONS_DX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the comorbid conditions listed by the user in the IGC Spotter.
